text: Hi Guys, we have this issue were we can't paste images right into support chat. We need to do this all the time. I'm sure some of you have this same issue. If you have some time please go and up vote this: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Paste-into-chat/idi-p/259369>
Hi James! The team is working on this now, and should have some good news for you in the coming weeks :slightly_smiling_face:
Thank you so much for the feedback!
That would be awesome! Thanks so much <@UDPJ43B39>
